sentences.en: Coleridge contributed the famous Rime of the Ancient Mariner.

sentences.en: Each Chinese syllable is divided into two parts: onset and rime.
sentences.cn: 每个中文音节都由两部分组成: 声母和韵母.

sentences.en: Kit Kat Wizard of thousands of Rime, the simple and honest clumsy shrubs pure heaven.

sentences.en: O , shall I worship , too, your snow and rime.

sentences.en: The beauty of rime in the Songhua River is characterized by grandeur and rareness.

sentences.en: The field was covered with rime in the early morning.

sentences.en: Was he conscious of what he was saying at the rime?

sentences.en: Why did you knock away far so long rime? There wasn't anybody in, you know.
sentences.cn: 你为什么敲门这么久? 要知道没人在家.
